jobDuties: Developed and maintained web applications using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to design and implement new features.
Performed code reviews and provided feedback to team members.
Troubleshot and resolved software defects and issues.
Led product planning and strategy for a new software product.
Conducted market research and analyzed user feedback to inform product decisions.
Worked closely with development teams to prioritize and execute product roadmap.
Collaborated with sales and marketing teams to drive product adoption and revenue growth.
